name: Kazushi
description: First available on April 23rd afterwards on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday. He's located in your classroom.
ranks: Rank 3: Say "Are you sure you're okay?" > Will it heal?
Rank 5: Say "The hospital again?" > Let him use your shoulder
Rank 6: Say "Suck it up" > Is it that important? > What will happen to your knee?
Rank 7: Ask "How's your knee?" > You need to toughen up
unlocks: For completing this social link you're able to fuse Thor through Normal or Triangle fusion.
